title: Appropriate serif font for gotham light
content:
Hi.  
I am currently looking for an appropriate serif font for sans serif font gotham light.  
Any suggestions? Thx a lot.

greets
author: hiaznbocha

comments.content:
What are you designing?

Without much to go on, maybe consider another H&FJ face, like Mercury or even Archer. I just finished reading a book that paired one or two weights of Gotham with Caledonia, to nice effect.

I'm designing a portfolio, but not graphic design but more product design. Mercury is quit ok.  
I use gotham as title and a serif font for the text.

Thx for the advice
